# Show Hidden Channels [![Download][download-badge]][download-link]

[download-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-%233a71c1.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,
[download-link]: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/2l47/mwittrien-BetterDiscordAddons/preserve-ShowHiddenChannels/Plugins/ShowHiddenChannels/ShowHiddenChannels.plugin.js

## About

Displays all hidden Channels, which can't be accessed due to Role Restrictions, this won't allow you to read them (impossible)

## Installation

1. Delete the 0BDFDB.data.json file from your BetterDiscord plugins folder, if it exists.
2. Download the replacement [BDFDB library](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/2l47/mwittrien-BetterDiscordAddons/preserve-ShowHiddenChannels/Library/0BDFDB.plugin.js) from this repository and [this plugin][download-link] and place them both in your BetterDiscord plugins folder. Replace any existing files.
3. Press Ctrl+R to reload Discord. Note that this plugin has had a bug for a while -- you may need to reload after launching Discord before hidden channels will be shown.
